TopicTitle: Nuclear explosions on NKD don't seem to work

Articles.Content:
Hi, 

     as you might have assumed by the title, the NKD(North Kerbin dynamics) mod A.K.A the 'nukes' mod doesn't seem to give me the nuclear explosions that i've seen in so many videos and it just replaces it with the normal squad-made explosion. Is this because BDArmory hasn't been updated for ages? Or is it because i might have installed it wrong installed it wrong? Or is it something else?

6 hours ago, Balegde said:

something else

HI

Read through the NKD  thread near the end you will find a recompiled DLL you need that in order for it to work properly in 1.2.2 . a few tiny things in BDA have changed and NKD uses BDA as part of it's code, BDA btw is fully updated

Simply download the zip,   extract it,   go to NKD plugins folder delete the existing plugin and paste in the downloaded update, there are no parts, nothing has changed apart from one tiny thing in the code. Fix approved by harpwner.
